meal_type_id, vip_name, vip_phone, meal_type_name, created_at, updated_at, payamount, unorder_reason, status, meal_type_code, t_created_at, t_updated_at, remark, app_user_name, app_user_code, update_status, is_dish, dest_time, vip_sex) select o.resv_order, o.business_id, o.business_name, o.vip_id, o.table_area_id, o.table_area_name, t.area_code, t.table_code, t.id, t.table_name, o.resv_num, o.resv_date, o.meal_type_id, o.vip_name, o.vip_phone, o.meal_type_name, o.created_at, o.updated_at, o.payamount, o.unorder_reason, (CASE WHEN o.isChangeTable IS NULL THEN o.`status` ELSE 1 END), m.meal_type_code, now(), now(), o.remark, (select app_user_name from app_user where id = o.app_user_id), aubm.app_user_code, '1', (select count(batch_no) from resv_dish where batch_no = o.app_user_id = aubm.app_user_id and o.business_id = aubm.business_id where o.business_id = #{businessId} and o.resv_date >= timestamp(date(sysdate())) and o.isTirdparty IS NULL and o.`status` in (1, aubm.app_user_code, table_name = t.table_name, resv_num = o.resv_num, resv_date = o.resv_date, meal_type_id = o.meal_type_id, meal_type_name = o.meal_type_name, updated_at = o.updated_at, payamount = o.payamount, unorder_reason = o.unorder_reason, meal_type_code = m.meal_type_code, update_status = (case when ( (resv_order_tem.status != o.status and resv_order_tem.status != 6) or resv_order_tem.table_id != o.table_id) then 0 else update_status end), resv_order_tem.table_id = t.id, resv_order_tem.is_dish = (select count(batch_no) from resv_dish where batch_no = o.batch_no)
mapper.select: select id, resv_order, business_id, table_area_id, IFNULL(resv_date, "") resv_date, IFNULL(area_code, "") area_code, IFNULL(table_code, "") table_code, CASE WHEN status = '2' THEN IFNULL((select actual_num from resv_order where resv_order = t.resv_order and t.business_id = t.business_id), "") ELSE IFNULL(resv_num, "") END AS resv_num, IFNULL(vip_phone, "") vip_phone, IFNULL(vip_name, "") vip_name, IFNULL(meal_type_name, "") meal_type_name, IFNULL(meal_type_code, "") meal_type_code, IFNULL(remark, "") remark, IFNULL(payamount, "") paymount, IFNULL(unorder_reason, "") unorder_reason, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') created_at, status, IFNULL(app_user_name, "") app_user_name, IFNULL(app_user_code, "") app_user_code, IFNULL(is_dish, 0) is_dish, dest_time/*到店时间*/, vip_sex/*性别*/ , third_order_no, update_status, meal_type_id from resv_order_tem t Where business_id = #{businessId} # and update_status = 0 and resv_date >= timestamp(date(sysdate()))
